titles.title: Healthy Communities through Helping to Offer Incentives and Choices to Everyone in Society Act
To provide a comprehensive approach to preventing and treating obesity.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, Natural Resources, Education and the Workforce, Transportation and Infrastructure, and Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to House Education and the Workforce
Referred to House Transportation and Infrastructure
